# Actor Del<!--
@name: Actor Del
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->


## Parameters


- **index**: Index of the Actor (can be a number or a text name). If "*" is used, all the actors will been removed.
-- Actor Del "1"
-- Actor Del "magic"
-- Actor Del "\*"
---
